findings.observation: High First Load JS (150kB) and potential TBT due to client-side hydration of non-critical tracking components (TrustBridgeTracker, UserJourneyTracker, etc.).
findings.action: Lazy load TrustBridgeTracker, TrustSignalViewportTracker, and UserJourneyTracker using next/dynamic with ssr: false.
findings.expected_impact: Reduced First Load JS by deferring tracker code to a separate chunk. Improved Total Blocking Time (TBT) by removing tracker hydration from the critical path.
